flavorText: The necromancer's touch strips away memory and loyalty, and only strength and malice remain.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Berührung des Nekromanten entfernt Gedächtnis und Loyalität, und es bleiben nur Stärke und Bosheit.
foreignData.name: Grimmige Rückkehr
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl in einem Friedhof, die in diesem Zug aus dem Spiel dorthin gelegt wurde. Bringe diese Karte unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: El toque del nigromante arranca toda memoria y lealtad, dejando solo fuerza y malicia.
foreignData.name: Regreso siniestro
foreignData.text: Elige la carta de criatura objetivo en un cementerio que haya ido allí desde el campo de batalla este turno. Pon esa carta en el campo de batalla bajo tu control.

foreignData.flavorText: Le contact d'un nécromancien efface mémoire et loyauté, ne laissant que force brute et malveillance.
foreignData.name: Sinistre retour
foreignData.text: Choisissez une carte de créature ciblée d'un cimetière qui y a été mise, ce tour-ci, depuis le champ de bataille. Mettez cette carte sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: Il tocco del necromante strappa ogni memoria e lealtà; lascia solo la forza e la malvagità.
foreignData.name: Macabro Ritorno
foreignData.text: Scegli una carta creatura bersaglio in un cimitero che vi è stata messa dal campo di battaglia in questo turno. Metti quella carta sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo.

foreignData.flavorText: 屍術師が触れるだけで記憶と絆は消え去り、力と悪意のみが後に残る。
foreignData.name: 不気味な帰還
foreignData.text: このターンに戦場からいずれかの墓地に置かれた、いずれかの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出す。

foreignData.flavorText: 사령술사의 손이 닿은 자는 예전의 기억과 충성심은 잃고 강력한 힘과 악의만 남은 존재가 된다.
foreignData.name: 섬뜩한 귀환
foreignData.text: 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 중 이 턴에 전장에서 무덤으로 간 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 조종하에 전장에 놓는다.

foreignData.flavorText: O toque do necromante arranca a memória e a lealdade, e restam apenas a força e a malevolência.
foreignData.name: Retorno Sinistro
foreignData.text: Escolha um card de criatura alvo em um cemitério que tenha sido colocado lá vindo do campo de batalha neste turno. Coloque aquele card no campo de batalha sob o seu controle.

foreignData.flavorText: Прикосновение некроманта развеивает воспоминания и преданность. Остаются только сила и злоба.
foreignData.name: Мрачное Возвращение
foreignData.text: Выберите целевую карту существа на кладбище, которая была положена туда с поля битвы в этом ходу. Положите ту карту на поле битвы под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 死灵术士的触碰将抹去记忆和忠诚，仅余下力量和恶意。
foreignData.name: 阴森重返
foreignData.text: 选择在坟墓场中的目标生物牌，且须为于本回合从战场进入该处者。将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 死靈術士的觸碰將抹去記憶和忠誠，僅餘下力量和惡意。
foreignData.name: 陰森重返
foreignData.text: 選擇在墳墓場中的目標生物牌，且須為於本回合從戰場進入該處者。將該牌在你的操控下放進戰場。

name: Grim Return
originalText: Choose target creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: You can choose a creature card in any player’s graveyard as long as that card was put there from the battlefield during the turn. A creature card that was put into a graveyard from anywhere else, such as a card that was discarded, can’t be chosen as the target.
Creature spells that are countered never entered the battlefield, so those cards can’t be chosen as the target of Grim Return.

text: Choose target creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.
